text:
David Michael Schramm (August 14, 1946 – March 28, 2020) was an American actor. He was best known for playing the role of Roy Biggins in the TV series "Wings". He was born in Louisville, Kentucky. Schramm appeared in the television movie, ' (1990), and the miniseries, "Kennedy" (1983), where he played Secretary of Defense Robert McNamara. Schramm played Vic Dumask in "Johnny Handsome" (1989).
Schramm died in New York City from a heart attack on March 28, 2020, at the age of 73.
